members.name: addNdefListener
members.description: Registers an event listener for any NDEF tag.

members.name: addTagDiscoveredListener
members.description: Registers an event listener for tags matching any tag type.

members.name: addMimeTypeListener
members.description: Registers an event listener for NDEF tags matching a specified MIME type.

members.name: addNdefFormatableListener
members.description: Registers an event listener for formatable NDEF tags.

members.name: write
members.description: Writes an NdefMessage(array of ndef records) to a NFC tag.

members.name: makeReadyOnly
members.description: Makes a NFC tag read only. **Warning** this is permanent.

members.name: share
members.description: Shares an NDEF Message(array of ndef records) via peer-to-peer.

members.name: unshare
members.description: Stop sharing NDEF data via peer-to-peer.

members.name: handover
members.description: Send a file to another device via NFC handover.

params.name: uris
params.description: A URI as a String, or an array of URIs.

members.name: stopHandover
members.description: Stop sharing NDEF data via NFC handover.

members.name: enabled
members.description: Check if NFC is available and enabled on this device.

members.name: bytesToHexString
members.description: Convert byte array to hex string
